title: Drawing, "Hardware for Bedroom Suite # 9002", September 11, 1935
medium: Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/501 MADISON AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 6393/1"-1'-0/F.S./WESTY/D./ 9/11/35, 9/11/35, 2, SL./1, OFFICE; inscribed in graphite, upper right: NOTE: SELECTED WHITE BIRDS EYE MAPLE ON #9002 - A/FIG. WAL ON 9002 (MAPLE); dimensions, materials, instructions in graphite
description: Elevation drawings of dresser, chest, vanity and night stand, section and plans for hardware for suite of furniture. Wood pulls of birds eye maple.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Hardware for Bedroom Suite # 9002", September 11, 1935. Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-915.
